full_summary:
### Wharf Construction at Lark Harbour, Newfoundland and Labrador
#### Transaction ID: WS4417993224
#### Solicitation Number: WS4417993224
#### Published Date: January 29, 2024
#### Closing Date: February 22, 2024 at 2:00 PM (AST)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites eligible Proponents to submit bids for the construction of a new wharf structure at Lark Harbour, NL. The project involves the furnishing of all necessary plant, labour, equipment, and materials to complete the work. The estimated value of the contract is in the range of $5,000,001 to $20,000,000.

#### Contract Requirements:
* Construction of a new wharf structure at Lark Harbour, NL
* Procurement of all necessary plant, labour, equipment, and materials
* Delivery date: 90 weeks after contract award
* Bid Security: Required during Phase Two

#### Trade Agreements:
The government of Canada intends to use trade agreement vehicles to evaluate bids. Bidders must be certified for the applicable trade agreement(s) listed below:
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

#### Contact Information:
Adam Beaumaster, PSPC/SPAC
Phone: None
Email: [adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
